meanings.definition: A condition in which an individual has an abnormally small head.
meanings.sent1: Babies born with microcephalies may require special care.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can diagnose microcephalies by measuring head circumference.
meanings.sent3: At the tiny hat store, only microcephalies could find the perfect fit.
meanings.sent4: In a world of big ideas, his microcephalies symbolized humility.
meanings.sent5: The image of microcephalies in medical textbooks is unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The state of having a head significantly smaller than average.
meanings.sent1: People with microcephalies may face challenges in daily activities.
meanings.sent2: The condition of microcephalies can vary in severity.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, his microcephalies made him the perfect bobblehead.
meanings.sent4: In a room full of big-headed individuals, her microcephalies stood out.
meanings.sent5: The doll with microcephalies was a unique addition to the collection.
